desc: Since 2007 Indi Surf has been the premiere surf shop / skate shop for the North Shore of Long Island. Owned and operated by real surfers and skaters Indi Surf is a surf shop / skate shop where performance and style still matter. Brands: Billabong, Katin, Da Kine, Johnnie-O, Rainbow Sandals, Reef, Rip Curl, RVCA, Vans.
